description: NTS Map: 082F04Rossland is an excellent all round ski destination, and the XC trails are just across from the Red Mountain ski resort.  The 500+ member non-profit ski club also hosts the annual BlackJack Loppet. Get more information here.
directions: Easy to find, take hiway 3B North of Rossland towards Red Mountain.  500m past Red Mountain, turn right on Mann Road and follow the signs for less than 1km to trailhead chalet and parking lot.
title: BlackJack XC
